messages.content:
==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-12T09:15:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Site Supervisor (Main Con)
  Project Phase: Visual Mockup Unit (VMU) Review
  4D Task Status: TASK_101: VMU Exterior Finishing - INSPECTION PENDING

[CHAT HISTORY]
  PM (Developer): Ah Meng, Architect says the concrete texture at the mockup area is not consistent. Client is coming at 2pm.
  Site Supervisor: Checking now boss. I am at the Ground Floor mockup zone.
  Site Supervisor: Found a few hairline cracks and some water staining on the main corner. See attached.<img_gt_001_1.png>

[USER QUERY]
  Check this crack and staining.
==================================================
Could you please provide the GUID of the element you are referring to? This will allow me to retrieve its details.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-03-05T11:20:00+08:00
  Sender Role: QC Officer
  Project Phase: Internal QA/QC Inspection
  4D Task Status: TASK_302: Window Frame Installation - COMPLETED

[CHAT HISTORY]
  QC Officer: Starting internal QA for the typical unit types.
  Site Supervisor: Window frames for the master bedroom already up. Can check the sealant.
  QC Officer: Window frame installation fine, but there are rubbish ard. Clean it asap <img_gt_002_1.png>

[USER QUERY]
  Inspect site environment.
==================================================

I cannot directly "inspect" the site environment. My capabilities are focused on interacting with the Building Information Model (BIM) to retrieve information about elements, their properties, and their spatial location.

I can help you by providing information about the digital model. Would you like to list the available spaces in the model to start an inspection there?

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-15T10:30:00+08:00
  Sender Role: RTO (Resident Technical Officer)
  Project Phase: Accessibility Submission Review
  4D Task Status: TASK_088: L1 Main Entrance Finishing - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Qualified Person (QP): RTO Tan, please verify if the L1 entrance clear opening matches the approved Universal Design plans.
  RTO: At the L1 Main Entrance now. Measuring the clear width.

[USER QUERY]
  Verify entrance clear opening and ramp slope.
==================================================

I can't find a space named "L1 Main Entrance" in the model. The available spaces are '3rok', 'area', and '5rok', all of which contain 0 elements.

Could you please provide the exact room name for the L1 Main Entrance as it appears in the BIM model, or the GUIDs of the entrance door and ramp elements? This will help me to retrieve their properties and verify the clear opening and ramp slope.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-04-10T14:45:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Fire Safety Engineer
  Project Phase: TOP Inspection Preparation
  4D Task Status: TASK_901: Fire Safety Systems Verification

[CHAT HISTORY]
  PM: SCDF inspection is in 2 weeks. All fire doors must have the correct rating tags.
  Fire Safety Engineer: Checking the corridor fire doors now. This one is missing the physical tag.

[USER QUERY]
  Check FireRating against code.
==================================================
Could you please provide the GUID of the fire door, or tell me which room it is in? This will allow me to check its FireRating.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-06-20T14:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Façade Specialist
  Project Phase: Superstructure Cycle (Level 6)
  4D Task Status: TASK_505: Module Installation L6 - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  BIM Coord: All, we are closing the RFI for the Level 6 Master Bedroom types.
  Façade Specialist: Noted. I am on the gondola outside.

[USER QUERY]
  Is the sealant leaking here?
==================================================

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-10T11:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Main Con Supervisor
  Project Phase: L1 Module Finishing
  4D Task Status: TASK_045: Ground Level Cladding - IN PROGRESS

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Main Con Supervisor: Working on the unit at the park-facing side (L1).
  Main Con Supervisor: I'm looking at the corner joint, seems to be a gap. See full view and close up.

[USER QUERY]
  The corner joint is loose.
==================================================

summary: Completed 6 ground truth test cases using MCP architecture
